scripts.before:release: npm run clean:reinstall && npm run before:release:check && npm run generate:license-report && npm run generate:all-licenses-list
scripts.before:release:check: npm run ts:check && npm run prettier:check && npm run lint
scripts.generate:license-report: npm install -g license-report && license-report --only=prod --output=markdown --department.value='Game Engine' --relatedTo.value='Runtime dependencies' > THIRD_PARTY_LICENSES.md
